page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA.
page.content: In 1981 the population of the parish of Nonington was 646.Our survey showed that most of the Nonongton schoolchildren's mums and dads work locally. We found that most of the mums go out to work either full or part time, and they are employed in Nonington, Canterbury, Deal and Ash. There is a lot of farmland in the area and approximately 10% of the dads work on the land. About the same number work at either one of the collieries of Tilmanstone or Snowdown. A few dads are self employed and most of the others have jobs based in either Canterbury or Dover, and these involve travelling to other parts of the south east.
